DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy safety evaluation Combigan timolol use adjunctive therapy Xalatan subject glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Efficacy Safety Combigan With Timolol Adjunctive Xalatan Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension Subjects
DOC.mesh_term: Brimonidine Tartrate , Timolol Maleate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Be least 18 year age Give write informed consent Be good general health determine doctor Have diagnosis unilateral bilateral glaucoma ocular hypertension If female child bear potential , must willing practice effective contraception duration study ( i.e. , abstinence , spermicide , condom , birth control pill ) Understand study instruction , able follow study instruction ; Be likely complete entire study period ( 12 week ) , include regularly schedule study visit Have active ocular disease glaucoma ocular hypertension would interfere study interpretation History severe renal hepatic impairment Subjects severe cardiovascular disease enrol unless disease control clearance obtain subject 's primary care physician and/or cardiologist Contraindications betaadrenoceptor antagonist therapy chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , bronchial asthma , sinus bradycardia , second third degree atrioventricular block , overt cardiac failure cardiogenic shock uncontrolled congestive heart failure Any systemic disease clinical evidence condition would make subject , opinion investigator , unsuitable study could potentially confound study result ; Concurrent participation prior participation investigational drug device study within last 30 day prior screen visit
